events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago but the tracking status hasn't updated and the package is not delivered yet. Can you help?
Issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay due to customer reporting late shipment and no tracking updates.
Customer request has been assigned to delivery support team to investigate delayed shipping issue.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your package has not arrived yet. I’m here to assist and check the status of your delivery.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking number, if available? This will help us look into the delay.
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking number is TRK987654321. The status hasn't changed in days.
We have contacted the courier service regarding your tracking and the package is delayed due to unforeseen logistical issues. We expect delivery within 5 days.
Thanks for the update, although I’m a bit disappointed the delivery will take longer, I appreciate your efforts to keep me informed.
We have updated the expected delivery date and will monitor your order until it arrives. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
We are checking in to confirm your order has been delivered successfully after the recent delay. Let us know if everything is satisfactory.
As your package has been delivered and no further issues were reported, this case will be closed. Thank you for your understanding.
